newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Intimate Brands cut to neutral.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Intimate Brands cut to neutral.

text.p: -- Rodman & Renshaw Inc said Friday it cut its rating on Intimate Brands Inc to neutral from buy, based on lowered expectations for Intimate Brands Bath & Body Works stores and Victoria's Secret catalog.

-- Rodman & Renshaw also said it lowered its third quarter earnings estimate for the company to $0.11 a share from $0.12, compared to $0.09 a year ago. Fourth quarter estimate was cut to $0.62 from $0.69, Rodman & Renshaw said. Fiscal 1997 estimate was cut to $1.02 from $1.10.

-- Rodman & Renshaw said it expected same-store sales growth in fiscal 1998 at Bath & Body Works to be 4-5 percent, down from its previous projection of nine percent growth. Victoria's Secret revenue is forecast flat, down from previous estimate of six percent growth, Rodman & Renshaw said.
-- Shares of Intimate Brands were down 1/4 at 16-1/4 Friday.
